name: GWJ-033: [REDACTED]
description:
You got trapped inside a laboratory with an murderous otherworldy creature. You are the only one alive and it can sense your smell...

Tiptoe trough the science facility and find a way to open gates to the safe room while avoiding the horror chasing you! Don't be too brave — a locker is your best friend. Listen to your motion sensor and try to be at least couple of corners away from this... thing.

CONTROLS:

  • WASD — Movement;
  • SPACEBAR — Interact with items and environment;
  • F — Drop bulky item.
  • R — Hold to reset the game

There is also a timer in top left corner for those who want to take the challenge of speedrunning!

_____________________________________________________________________

Made for the Godot Wild Jam #33 with the theme "You aren't the Hero".

Art by eHEL
Music by kiberptah
Programming by Kwabsi
Sound Design by Romeromey
